Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that helps two students communicate over a distance.
The student can show how the device uses sound to send or receive information.
The student can include in the drawing only the materials that were provided to create the device.
The student can illustrate the solution's key features, like how the sound travels from one end to the other.
The student can demonstrate in their drawing how the device solves the problem of communicating over a long distance.
The student can depict in the drawing why this communication device is helpful to people.
